about_the_game:
EXPERIENCE HIGH OCTANE KARTING... ON PC?!?!

Are you SICK AND TIRED of certain companies not putting fun kart games on PC? Are you also tired of trying to mod tracks and racers into some emulator only for said company to try and destroy the emulator? Or, if you've answered "no" to either of those, do you wanna shoot your roommate in the back of the head with a missile? I (the developer) have solved all of these problems and more!!!

Play the most customizable Kart game this side (either side) of the Mississippi!

FEATURES

You read it right! This game has features! Including...
  • Online multiplayer!
  • Original tracks & racers!
  • Modded tracks & racers via Steam Workshop!
  • High speed action with various items!
  • Accessible SDK for custom content development!
  • Original soundtrack (by me, the developer!)

name: KART

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A kart racer?! On PC?! with Steam Workshop support for tracks, racers, and more?! Playable offline or online, with friends or otherwise!? Yeah, you're not dreaming; this is real!
